metadata.title: CVE-2020-21913 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
International Components for Unicode (ICU-20850) v66.1 was discovered tocontain a use after free bug in the pkg_createWithAssemblyCode function inthe file tools/pkgdata/pkgdata.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu63 - 66.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '66.1-2ubuntu1').
